Procedure.name: ohObjectSave
Procedure.description: Serialize list of objects to given path, return count of objects serialized

Parameter.name: ObjectList
Parameter.description: list of IDs of objects to be serialized

Parameter.name: Filename
Parameter.description: file name to which objects are to be serialized

Parameter.name: Overwrite
Parameter.description: overwrite the output file if it exists

Procedure.name: ohObjectLoad
Procedure.description: Deserialize list of objects from given file, return IDs of deserialized objects

Parameter.name: Directory
Parameter.description: Directory from which objects are to be deserialized.

Parameter.name: Pattern
Parameter.description: Name of XML file from which objects are to be deserialized, or a pattern in UNIX format (wildcard is .*).

Parameter.name: Recurse
Parameter.description: Recurse subdirectories of Directory when searching for filenames matching Pattern

Parameter.name: Overwrite
Parameter.description: Overwrite any existing Object that has the same ID as one being loaded

Procedure.name: ohObjectSaveString
Procedure.description: Serialize list of objects to given path, return resulting XML

Parameter.name: ObjectList
Parameter.description: list of IDs of objects to be serialized

Parameter.name: Overwrite
Parameter.description: overwrite the output file if it exists

Procedure.name: ohObjectLoadString
Procedure.description: Deserialize list of objects from given string, return IDs of deserialized objects

Parameter.name: Xml
Parameter.description: XML string from which objects are to be deserialized.

Parameter.name: Overwrite
Parameter.description: Overwrite any existing Object that has the same ID as one being loaded
